'''Daniel Frisk''' oversaw the server architecture behind Minecraft.net. He joined the team on February 21, 2011.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2011/02/a-new-daniel-and-a-new-support-system/</ref> On March 28, 2018, he announced his departure from Mojang.<ref>{{tweet|danfrisk|979083288223641600|Last day at Mojang today. Feels like it’s been forever and that it passed very fast. Thank you my friends.|March 28, 2018}}</ref>
